trans-unit.source: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem" /> objects for components.
trans-unit.target: Establece un servicio en tiempo de diseño que administra la colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem" /> para componentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class is responsible for managing the collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> clase es responsable de administrar la colección de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objetos para cada instancia de un componente que existe en un formulario en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase permite a un modelo de inserción directo de creación del elemento y sirve principalmente para su uso por los desarrolladores de herramientas de tiempo de diseño, aunque también se puede usar por componente y los programadores de controles personalizados.

trans-unit.source: Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores de herramientas de tiempo de diseño deberá determinar la lista de elementos que desea mostrar para un componente y determinar cuándo cambia esta lista.

trans-unit.source: They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects.
trans-unit.target: También pueden crear complementos que funcionan junto con objetos de panel de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model.
trans-unit.target: Advanced componente a los desarrolladores que tenga que controlar dinámicamente los elementos asociados a un componente, por lo tanto, reemplazar o complementar el modelo de extracción estándar.

trans-unit.source: For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, comandos de panel se pueden modificar según el contexto de su uso y el estado de tiempo de diseño del componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> es realmente el servicio determinante detrás de los modelos de extracción e inserción; sin embargo, en el último caso funciona implícitamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> Proporciona una interfaz sencilla para obtener acceso y manipular los elementos de cada componente, incluyendo los siguientes métodos y eventos:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> method determines whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> is currently managing a particular component.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> método determina si el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> está administrando actualmente un componente determinado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method supports the enumeration of the lists of items.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> método es compatible con la enumeración de las listas de elementos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method allows adding a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> to the set of existing items for a component instance.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> método permite agregar una <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> al conjunto de elementos existentes para una instancia del componente.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: En cambio, la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> método quita una o todas las listas de elementos asociadas a un componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> método representa el modelo de inserción directa de asociar elementos de panel a un componente.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of the designer class for that component.
trans-unit.target: En cambio, el modelo de extracción se basa en reemplazar el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad de la clase de diseñador para ese componente.

trans-unit.source: The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> when a component is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El entorno de diseño es responsable de agregar estos elementos en la actual <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> cuando se crea un componente en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods only consider or affect push-model items.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> métodos solo considere o afectan a los elementos de modelo de inserción.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento indica cuándo cambia la colección de elementos de un componente.

trans-unit.source: Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects and designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Dado que a menudo es conveniente usar algunos de los mismos elementos de panel en el menú de acceso directo de tiempo de diseño del componente y su panel, existe un alto grado de interoperabilidad entre <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objetos y verbos de diseñador.

trans-unit.source: If a component designer does not explicitly specify a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> (that is, it does not contain an overridden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Si un diseñador de componentes no especifica explícitamente un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> (es decir, no contiene un invalidado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad), a continuación, se creará una lista de verbos de diseñador existentes.

trans-unit.source: These verbs are specified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Estos verbos especificados por el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, se utiliza una clase de lista de verbos interna para contener la colección de entradas en el panel elemento verbo.

trans-unit.source: If you want a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Si desea que un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> para utilizarse como una entrada en el panel y una entrada de menú contextual en tiempo de diseño, puede establecer el `includeAsDesignerVerb` parámetro en el constructor del elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> to control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> para controlar la presentación de su diseñador <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The service provider for the current design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Proveedor de servicios para el entorno actual en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.

trans-unit.source: A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes.
trans-unit.target: Un proveedor de servicios es necesario para supervisar la selección y cambios en los componentes.

trans-unit.source: It is expected to support the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> types.
trans-unit.target: Se espera que admita la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> tipos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> smart tags.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> clase utiliza una tabla interna para administrar componentes y sus asociados <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, los desarrolladores de componentes no necesitará crear una instancia de esta clase; en su lugar, puede adquirir una instancia existente mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Adds one or more <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Agrega uno o varios objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> a la colección actual de etiquetas inteligentes administradas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> que se va a asociar a las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> que contiene los nuevos elementos de etiqueta inteligente que se van a agregar.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> a la colección actual de etiquetas inteligentes administradas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> método representa el modelo de inserción de agregar elementos de etiqueta inteligente.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de extracción alternativo consiste en reemplazar el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad en el diseñador para el componente correspondiente.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a este método, se examinan las listas que se va a agregar para cualquier <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> con el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> propiedad establecida en `true`.

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Estos elementos se agregan a la lista de verbos de diseñador para este componente, mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Las etiquetas inteligentes se administran en forma de instancia de componente.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: La colección administrada puede contener entradas duplicadas.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método provoca el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno o ambos parámetros son <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> que se va a asociar a las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> que contiene los nuevos elementos de etiqueta inteligente que se van a agregar.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> a la colección actual de etiquetas inteligentes administradas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> método representa el modelo de inserción de agregar elementos de etiqueta inteligente.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: El modelo de extracción alternativo consiste en reemplazar el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad en el diseñador para el componente correspondiente.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a este método, se examinan las listas que se va a agregar para cualquier <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> con el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> propiedad establecida en `true`.

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Estos elementos se agregan a la lista de verbos de diseñador para este componente, mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Las etiquetas inteligentes se administran en forma de instancia de componente.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: La colección administrada puede contener entradas duplicadas.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método provoca el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno o ambos parámetros son <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los componentes de la administración y borra todas las listas de etiquetas inteligentes de modelo de inserción.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> método vacía la tabla interna que se utiliza para almacenar información acerca de componentes y su modelo de inserción de listas de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously.
trans-unit.target: Dado que este método afecta a todos los componentes administrados por el servicio actual y no solo el componente actual, este método debe utilizarse con precaución.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, los desarrolladores de herramientas de tiempo de diseño usa al restablecer una superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Component developers should use one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores de componentes deben utilizar uno de los <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> métodos en su lugar quitar la etiqueta inteligente individual elementos o listas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> evento se desencadena para cada componente que anteriormente estaba administrada por el servicio actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> que se va a buscar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current smart tag service manages the action lists for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Determina si el servicio actual de etiquetas inteligentes administra las listas de acciones para el componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el servicio actual administra el componente; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> método sólo reconoce etiquetas inteligentes del modelo de inserción, que están asociadas a un componente con el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.
trans-unit.target: Aunque no hay ninguna limitación estructural en la cantidad de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> instancias creadas por una herramienta en tiempo de diseño, normalmente una sola instancia del servicio se crea por la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comp" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comp" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> is removed or added for any component.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se quita o agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> para cualquier componente.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: En la tabla siguiente muestra el conjunto de clases especializadas asociadas con el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Specialized type
trans-unit.target: Tipo especializado

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: Adds information specific to smart tag list management.
trans-unit.target: Agrega información específica para la administración de la lista de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase está especializada de <xref:System.EventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> with its handler.
trans-unit.target: Se conecta el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> con su controlador.

trans-unit.source: Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Indica si se agrega una lista o se quitó.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el control de eventos, vea [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos que utiliza la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> método es la implementación del método solo exigido por la <xref:System.IDisposable> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Hay que llamar a este método cuando se deja de utilizar el objeto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions:
trans-unit.target: Realiza dos acciones principales:

trans-unit.source: Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quita el servicio actual de la lista de servicios disponibles en el entorno de diseño a través de una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Cancela la suscripción a eventos de cambio de componente de asociado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado de usar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> del objeto `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> método es la implementación del método solo exigido por la <xref:System.IDisposable> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Hay que llamar a este método cuando se deja de utilizar el objeto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions:
trans-unit.target: Realiza dos acciones principales:

trans-unit.source: Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quita el servicio actual de la lista de servicios disponibles en el entorno de diseño a través de una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Cancela la suscripción a eventos de cambio de componente de asociado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a este método público `Dispose()` método y <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` se invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` con `disposing` establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> references.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el parámetro `disposing` es `true`, este método libera todos los recursos retenidos por los objetos administrados a los que el control <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> hace referencia.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca al método `Dispose()` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> puede recibir varias llamadas de otros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <see langword="Dispose" /> y <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la colección de listas de elementos de etiqueta inteligente asociados a un componente.

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Componente al que están asociadas las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la colección de listas de elementos de etiqueta inteligente asociados a un componente.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Colección de etiquetas inteligentes para el componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method is equivalent to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29> method using a `type` parameter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType.All>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> método es equivalente a una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29> método mediante un `type` parámetro de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType.All>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, la colección devuelta contendrá las listas de inserción y extracción de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is the union of item lists added through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> methods and also the lists obtained from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> instance obtained from the component’s site.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> es la unión de las listas de elementos agregadas a través de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> métodos así como las listas se obtienen de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> Obtiene la instancia del sitio del componente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comp" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comp" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Componente al que están asociadas las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType" /> to filter the associated smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType" /> con la que se filtran las etiquetas inteligentes asociadas.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists of the specified type associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la colección de listas de elementos de etiqueta inteligente del tipo especificado asociado a un componente.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags of the specified type for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Colección de etiquetas inteligentes del tipo especificado para el componente determinado.

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values.
trans-unit.target: Esta versión de sobrecargado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> método filtra según la `type` parámetro, que puede tener uno de los siguientes valores.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: All associated smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Todos los asociados de etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Pull-model smart tags only.
trans-unit.target: Sólo etiquetas inteligentes del modelo de extracción.

trans-unit.source: Push-model smart tags only.
trans-unit.target: Sólo etiquetas inteligentes del modelo de inserción.

trans-unit.source: If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Si el diseñador asociado de un componente no proporciona una lista de etiquetas inteligentes de modelo de extracción, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> método en su lugar, utilizará los elementos de menú contextual en tiempo de diseño del Diseñador de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comp" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comp" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Componente al que están asociadas las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: Colección a la que se van a agregar las etiquetas inteligentes asociadas.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the pull-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Recupera las etiquetas inteligentes del modelo de extracción asociadas a un componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentDesignerActions%2A> method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentDesignerActions%2A> método es un método auxiliar para el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentDesignerActions%2A> searches for pull-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType.Component>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentDesignerActions%2A> busca el modelo de extracción las etiquetas de tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType.Component>y, a continuación, las agrega a la proporcionada `actionLists` colección.

trans-unit.source: If the component's developer does not explicitly supply a collection of smart tags through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of its designer, this method will reuse the design-time shortcut menu entries, which are obtained through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Si el desarrollador del componente no proporciona explícitamente una colección de etiquetas inteligentes a través de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad de su diseñador, este método va a reutilizar las entradas de menú contextual en tiempo de diseño, que se obtienen a través de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> propiedad del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno o ambos parámetros son <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Componente al que están asociadas las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: Colección a la que se van a agregar las etiquetas inteligentes asociadas.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the push-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Recupera las etiquetas inteligentes del modelo de inserción asociadas a un componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentServiceActions%2A> method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentServiceActions%2A> método es un método auxiliar para el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: It searches for push-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType.Service>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: Busca etiquetas inteligentes del modelo de inserción del tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType.Service>y, a continuación, las agrega a la proporcionada `actionLists` colección.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno o ambos parámetros son <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Disassociates one or more smart tag lists from one or more components.
trans-unit.target: Desasocia una o varias listas de etiquetas inteligentes de uno o varios componentes.

trans-unit.source: The list of smart tags to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Lista de etiquetas inteligentes que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from all components managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: Quita la lista de etiquetas inteligentes especificada de todos los componentes administrados mediante el servicio actual.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space.
trans-unit.target: Esta versión de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> método suele usarse por los desarrolladores de herramientas de diseño, ya que los desarrolladores de componentes normalmente no saben qué otros componentes existen en el espacio de diseño actual.

trans-unit.source: If successful, this method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Si realiza correctamente, este método provoca el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="actionList" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="actionList" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: Componente del que se van a desasociar las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Removes all the smart tag lists associated with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Quita todas las listas de etiquetas inteligentes asociadas al componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Si se realiza correctamente, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> método genera el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comp" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comp" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: Componente del que se van a desasociar las etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The smart tag list to remove.
trans-unit.target: Lista de etiquetas inteligentes que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Quita la lista de etiquetas inteligentes especificada del componente determinado.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Si se realiza correctamente, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> método genera el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno o ambos parámetros son <see langword="null" />.
